body.name: Capri Stainless Steel Nonstick Mini Fry Pan/Skillet Perfect for Making 3 Eggs, 7"
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: EASY AS 1-2-3: Specially designed fry pans to cook 1, 2 or 3 eggs at a time. Each Capri fry pan features a quality non-stick coating with high sides to make the flipping of eggs or omelets much easier. Choose from the 1 egg size (5.5” diameter) 2 egg size (6.3” diameter) or 3 egg size (7” diameter) for convenient egg preparation. When cooking for 1 or 2 these fry pans offer an easy alternative to other larger cookware pieces.

STAINLESS/NONSTICK FRY PAN: This small fry pan, perfect for 3 eggs, has an approximately 7-inch diameter and a 7” lightweight stainless steel handle. It has been designed to the highest quality standards with a clad bottom base, welded handle and high quality non-stick coating. Dishwasher safe. To extend the life of the pan, cook with medium heat and do not use metal utensils.
SUITABLE FOR ALL COOKTOPS: Küchenprofi Capri cookware is suitable for any stovetop, including gas, electric, and induction.

VERSATILE AND CONVENIENT: Go ahead: when you want that certain pan for cooking eggs or an omelet, this pan is the time saver that you've been looking for in the kitchen. This dishwasher safe, stainless steel/nonstick fry pan is extra easy to use, clean and store.

TRADITION OF QUALITY: Küchenprofi was founded in Germany in 1923. Designing top-tier items has distinguished this brand as one of the best in the industry. They strive to bring imagination and creativity to the home cook's kitchen and to enhance your overall cooking experience. Frieling has partnered with this brand since 2017 and proudly brings its premium quality hand tools, salt and pepper mills, and more to the US market.
body.description: Küchenprofi was founded in Germany in 1923. Designing top tier items has distinguished this brand as one of the best in the industry, and they love bringing imagination and creativity to the stove and overall cooking experience! For home cooks who demand the highest quality kitchen tools and utensils, Küchenprofi is here to help. If you want professional grade pots for cooking to use at home to elevate your kitchen experience, look no further. Frieling has partnered with this brand since 2017 and proudly brings their design of hand tools, salt and pepper mills, and more to the US market. Frieling does not just sell products, they offer solutions by partnering only with the best brands of the industry. This is why Küchenprofi is one of our brands of distinction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For The Little Meals In Life
reviews.reviewText: This has easily become my go-to omelet and anything-egg related pan. It's also great for a quick grilled cheese sandwich - and I say quick because cleaning up this pan is a breeze.I highly recommend this pan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little pan for eggs and omelets
reviews.reviewText: The pan has a very nice finish both inside and out, with the inside being a nice nonstick. We've used it several times now and it heats evenly, is truly nonstick, and while the description doesn't say anything about the handle being heat-resistant, it definitely seems to be as I've had no issue picking up the pan to flip eggs or omelets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent small omelet pan…nothing special, but nothing bad
reviews.reviewText: First, this is a tiny pan. Really the smallest you can use for an omelet. I prefer a 10” pan for my omelets.The nonstick surface is good. I always use oil or butter anyway, but the omelets slide smoothly.The bottom surface heats pretty evenly, but that could be because the entire pan gets heat since it is so small.For me, I grab this as a specialty pan if I need to cook something small like frying a couple eggs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect small pan
reviews.reviewText: The "Küchenprofi Capri Stainless Steel Nonstick Mini Fry Pan/Skillet Perfect for Making 3 Eggs, 7"" is the perfect small pan. One thing right away, the German text on the label declares a 5 year warranty, that is unheard of for a pan. I could not find that statement anywhere in the English version, but I take it as a bonus. I grew up with this brand in Germany, it is well known for good and long lasting kitchen products. Profi means professional and I hope this pan lives up to it. This is a small but mighty pan. It has a clad bottom base, a welded don't get hot, juts warm handle and high quality non-stick coating. It is dishwasher safe and it's light weight is great for arthritic hands. This pan will be used almost every day in our household. When I ordered this pan, the price was higher; it has come down to $25.61, a great value considering the 5 year warranty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars German made and just the right size
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for 3 eggs. Well made (from Germany) and the handle does not get hot. Easy to just slide the eggs out without breaking the yolks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Saute Pan is Mediocre
reviews.reviewText: On the positive side it has a nice nonstick surface when cooking. On the negative side, I feel like it's cheaply made because the handle is very thin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You don't need oven mits
reviews.reviewText: I was worried the metal handle would be hot with the pan but it didn't even get warm. The handle looks like it's welded on and there no screws to come loose. It heats quickly. Lightweight but it is small this would be a one person type of pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect small size. Works Great. Good Price.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect small size. Works Great. Good Price.Heavy duty bottom for good heating up and good heat distribution. Perfect small size for frying egg, bacon, sauces... Stainless steel, non stick inside. Looks good, feels good, easy to use and clean. Good price.

👍 Esperaba que fuera más pesada, la grata sorpresa es que como el mango es muy liviano, hace que sea poco pesada.👍 Por el momento el antiadherente está resultando bastante bueno… el tiempo lo dirá (y yo lo reflejaré).👍 Bonito diseño y buen acero.👍 Lo suficientemente profunda para hacer desde una tortilla de un huevo, como para hacer una tortilla redonda de hasta media docena (puede que alguno mas).☝️ Medio en contra, es que no llega muy protegida por lo que llegó algo rozada en la parte superior, y aunque no afecta a la zona de cocción, se ve un poco pelada.
